summary: "The Hunger Games" is a 2012 American action movie based on Suzanne Collins' book. It's set in a dystopian world where teenagers must fight to the death on TV. Katniss Everdeen (Jennifer Lawrence) and Peeta Mellark (Josh Hutcherson) are forced to compete. The movie was well-received, making lots of money and winning awards, especially for Lawrence's performance. It led to more films in the franchise, starting with "Catching Fire" in 2013.
title: The Hunger Games (film)
